about_the_game:
Become the ultimate hockey general manager in Hockey Legacy Manager 25 (HLM25)! Take control of a professional hockey team and create an enduring legacy. Experience the most immersive mobile hockey manager with features that let you dominate the league for decades!

🏒 THE ULTIMATE HOCKEY GM EXPERIENCE 🏒

Manage every aspect of your team, from coaching and scouting to drafting and trading. Negotiate contracts and develop players to lead your team to victory.

📱 OFFLINE HOCKEY MANAGER 📱

Play anytime, anywhere - no internet connection required! HLM25 lets you enjoy the excitement of managing your hockey team whenever you want.

⬆️ UNIQUE CAREER STORYLINES ⬆️

Follow the evolution of the entire league, witnessing teams rise from declining contenders to rising superstars. Track league records, draft classes, player transactions, and more!

🌐 FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE 🌐

Customize players, teams, coaches, and leagues! Take control of your hockey universe and shape its future with expansion drafts.

📅 START FROM 1917 📅

Begin your career from the early days of hockey and lead your team through the ages. Make strategic decisions and leave a lasting impact on the league's history.

🆕 NEW FEATURES 🆕

Hockey Legacy Manager 25 introduces exciting new features to enhance your hockey management experience:

🏅 Hall of Fame: Experience the prestige of the Hall of Fame with the new nomination and induction feature. Each team can nominate players based on their career achievements, and witness the celebration of hockey legends!

🔄 Three-Team Trades: Make big trades involving three teams to improve your roster and create the best team possible.

✍️ Contract Clauses: Handle contract negotiations with new options like No Trade Clauses (NTC) and No Movement Clauses (NMC) to add more strategy.

📥 Inbox: Keep track of team activities and messages with a new inbox feature that shows league news, trade offers, and more.

🏋️ Player Training: Improve your players’ skills with a new training system that lets you customize their development.

🎮 PROLONGED GAMING EXPERIENCE 🎮

With Hockey Legacy Manager, you can play for decades and even centuries, experiencing the thrill of hockey management for ages!

🏒 Start your General Manager career now and leave your mark on the hockey world! Download Hockey Legacy Manager 25 today! 🏒
